PROFILE_SETTINGS.TITLE: Profile Settings
PROFILE_SETTINGS.AVATAR_DELETE_FAILED: There is an error while deleting avatar, please try again
PROFILE_SETTINGS.UPDATE_SUCCESS: Your profile has been updated successfully
PROFILE_SETTINGS.PASSWORD_UPDATE_SUCCESS: Your password has been changed successfully
PROFILE_SETTINGS.AFTER_EMAIL_CHANGED: Your profile has been updated successfully, please login again as your login credentials are changed

PROFILE_SECTION.TITLE: Profile
PROFILE_SECTION.NOTE: Your email address is your identity and is used to log in.

SEND_MESSAGE.TITLE: Hotkey to send messages
SEND_MESSAGE.NOTE: You can select a hotkey (either Enter or Cmd/Ctrl+Enter) based on your preference of writing.
SEND_MESSAGE.UPDATE_SUCCESS: Your settings have been updated successfully

ENTER_KEY.HEADING: Enter (↵)
ENTER_KEY.CONTENT: Send messages by pressing Enter key instead of clicking the send button.

CMD_ENTER_KEY.HEADING: Cmd/Ctrl + Enter (⌘ + ↵)
CMD_ENTER_KEY.CONTENT: Send messages by pressing Cmd/Ctrl + enter key instead of clicking the send button.

MESSAGE_SIGNATURE_SECTION.TITLE: Personal message signature
MESSAGE_SIGNATURE_SECTION.NOTE: Create a personal message signature that would be added to all the messages you send from your email inbox. Use the rich content editor to create a highly personalised signature.

MESSAGE_SIGNATURE.LABEL: Message Signature
MESSAGE_SIGNATURE.PLACEHOLDER: Insert your personal message signature here.

PASSWORD_SECTION.TITLE: Password
PASSWORD_SECTION.NOTE: Updating your password would reset your logins in multiple devices.

ACCESS_TOKEN.TITLE: Prístupový token
ACCESS_TOKEN.NOTE: Tento token môžete použiť, ak vytvárate integráciu založenú na rozhraní API

AUDIO_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.TITLE: Zvukové oznámenia
AUDIO_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.NOTE: Povoliť zvukové upozornenia na paneli s novými správami a konverzáciami.

CONDITIONS.TITLE: Alert conditions:
CONDITIONS.CONDITION_ONE: Send audio alerts only if the browser window is not active
CONDITIONS.CONDITION_TWO: Send alerts every 30s until all the assigned conversations are read

EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.TITLE: E-mailové notifikácie
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.NOTE: Aktualizujte svoje preferencie e-mailových oznámení tu
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_ASSIGNMENT: Odosielať e-mailové upozornenia, keď mi je priradená konverzácia
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_CREATION: Odosielať e-mailové upozornenia pri vytvorení novej konverzácie
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_MENTION: Odosielať e-mailové upozornenia keď som spomenutý v konverzácii
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.ASSIGNED_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: Odosielať e-mailové oznámenia pri vytvorení novej správy v priradenej konverzácii
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.PARTICIPATING_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: Send email notifications when a new message is created in a participating conversation

API.UPDATE_SUCCESS: Vaše nastavenia oznámení sa úspešne aktualizovali
API.UPDATE_ERROR: Pri aktualizácii nastavení došlo k chybe, skúste to prosím znova

PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.TITLE: Oznámenia Push
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.NOTE: Aktualizujte svoje predvoľby oznámení Push tu
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_ASSIGNMENT: Odosielať Push oznámenia, keď mi je priradená konverzácia
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_CREATION: Odosielať Push upozornenia pri vytvorení novej konverzácie
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_MENTION: Odosielať Push upozornenia keď som spomenutý v konverzácii
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.ASSIGNED_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: Odosielať Push oznámenia pri vytvorení novej správy v priradenej konverzácii
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.PARTICIPATING_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: Send push notifications when a new message is created in a participating conversation
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.HAS_ENABLED_PUSH: Pre tento prehliadač ste povolili oznámenia Push.

DISPLAY_NAME.LABEL: Zobrazované meno
DISPLAY_NAME.PLACEHOLDER: Zadajte prosím zobrazované meno, ktoré sa bude zobrazovať v konverzáciách

AVAILABILITY.LABEL: Dostupnosť
AVAILABILITY.SET_AVAILABILITY_ERROR: Couldn't set availability, please try again

EMAIL.LABEL: Vaša e-mailová adresa
EMAIL.PLACEHOLDER: Zadajte prosím vašu e-mailovú adresu, ktorá sa bude zobrazovať v konverzáciách

PASSWORD.LABEL: New password
PASSWORD.ERROR: Zadajte heslo s dĺžkou 6 alebo viac

PASSWORD_CONFIRMATION.LABEL: Potvrďte nové heslo
PASSWORD_CONFIRMATION.ERROR: Potvrdzovacie heslo by sa malo zhodovať s heslom

ACCOUNT_SUSPENDED.TITLE: Account Suspended
ACCOUNT_SUSPENDED.MESSAGE: Your account is suspended. Please reach out to the support team for more information.

FILE_BUBBLE.INSTAGRAM_STORY_UNAVAILABLE: This story is no longer available.

SIDEBAR.FACEBOOK_REAUTHORIZE: Vaše pripojenie k Facebooku vypršalo, pre pokračovanie v službách prosím znovu pripojte svoju stránku na Facebooku

SET_AUTO_OFFLINE.INFO_TEXT: Let the system automatically mark you offline when you aren't using the app or dashboard.

BILLING_SETTINGS.TITLE: Billing

CURRENT_PLAN.TITLE: Current Plan
CURRENT_PLAN.PLAN_NOTE: You are currently subscribed to the **%{plan}** plan with **%{quantity}** licenses

MANAGE_SUBSCRIPTION.TITLE: Manage your subscription
MANAGE_SUBSCRIPTION.DESCRIPTION: View your previous invoices, edit your billing details, or cancel your subscription.

CHAT_WITH_US.TITLE: Need help?
CHAT_WITH_US.DESCRIPTION: Do you face any issues in billing? We are here to help.

BILLING_SETTINGS.NO_BILLING_USER: Your billing account is being configured. Please refresh the page and try again.

CREATE_ACCOUNT.NO_ACCOUNT_WARNING: Uh oh! We could not find any Chatwoot accounts. Please create a new account to continue.

API.ERROR_MESSAGE: Nepodarilo sa pripojiť k serveru Woot, skúste to prosím neskôr

TITLE.MOVE_TO_NEXT_TAB: Presun na ďalšiu kartu v zozname konverzácií
